subject: Re: Something I forgot in some boxes [1 Attachment]
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

I can only speak for myself, but here it is:

Awhile ago, another skeptic (or two?) left the list, and I thought it was okay to post here.  Then, "Rj" and friend filled in the skeptic gap, big time.  

I deal with enough critics and skeptics in the rest of my work. I don't work nearly as well when I'm upset, and fretting because someone has insulted me (or my intelligence) or someone I respect, like Frank.

I'm learning that insulating myself allows me to focus on my work. If that's what I have to do... well, that's what I'll do.

I've been in "wait and see" mode here, in case there are yet more critics and skeptics who'll fill in the "Rj" gap.  I want to believe that everything's okay now, but I'm still stinging from recent negative comments, on and off of this list.

But mostly, I'm about to leave for my biggest annual gig, in a field that's become more land mines than safe paths.  Between the anxiety and the pre-event preps, I'm in lurk mode here... and I'll be offline entirely for most of the first two weeks of September.

So, those are the reasons why I've been quiet.

In haste,
Fiona
